If there is time after this, I will ask questions that are open ended for them to share a time when they did X, where X is something along the lines of "disagreed with technical direction of another individual or manager", "applied a good engineering practice, and what was the practice?" or some other answer that gives information both from what they decide to share, as well as how they describe the disagreement/learning/etc. I don't typically do a coding exercise, since the rating system basically helped me triangulate their proficiency.
